name: Clicker Clicker
description: Clicker Clicker Is A Game I Made that I Never Released. I Thought It Was Unfinished But Since I Have To Wipe My Laptop I  Decided To Publish It For Several  Reasons First I Don't Want To leave It Behind And Second If I Do Leave It I Would Of Spent 4 Days Of My Life For Nothing, Plus I've Always Wanted To Make A Clicker Game.
